price: Àyàfi ’Iblīs, tí ó ṣègbéraga. Ó sì wà nínú àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
